scripts.build: electron-packager . BTCassistant --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out dist/ --overwrite && electron-packager . BTCassistant --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite && rm dist/installers/btcassistant_win64.zip && cd dist && zip -r installers/btcassistant_win64.zip BTCassistant-win32-x64/ && cd .. && electron-installer-debian --src dist/BTCassistant-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch amd64
scripts.install: sudo dpkg -i $(ls dist/installers/*.deb | grep "$(ls dist/installers/*.deb | cut -d'_' -f2 | sort --field-separator='.' -k2 -k3 -k4 -g -r | head -n1)")
